name: @real-estate/infrastructure
description: AWS CDK Infrastructure for Real Estate Microservices

scripts.localstack:bootstrap: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test cdklocal bootstrap --app 'npx ts-node bin/localstack-app.ts'
scripts.localstack:deploy: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test cdklocal deploy --app 'npx ts-node bin/localstack-app.ts' --context stage=test --require-approval never
scripts.localstack:diff: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test cdklocal diff --app 'npx ts-node bin/localstack-app.ts' --context stage=test
scripts.localstack:destroy: AWS_ENDPOINT_URL=http://localhost:4566 AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID=test AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY=test cdklocal destroy --app 'npx ts-node bin/localstack-app.ts' --context stage=test
